title: pavana tanaya
sahitya:
pavana tanaya rAma dUtA tE padAbjE bhajE shrI


anupallavi

  bhuvana vidhita karuNApatE (sakala) bhU dhara nibha bhujayuga tIrNa mahaaptE


caraNam    bhUmijA caraNa pankaja madhukara puruhuta suta sakE kapi nAyaka
rAma nAmAmrta pAna lOlubha rAmadAsa hrdayAlaya mAmava
